        <description>Executes the corresponding scheduled job that will attempt to update all Instance Root Key (IRK) metadata.</description>
        <name>Update all Instance Root Key metadata</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var JOB = 'b66df7804f013110fd02a02b32ce0bcc';
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
    if (!gr.get(JOB)) {
        gs.error("Update all Instance Root Key metadata :: Could not find scheduled job with sys_id: " + JOB);
        return;
    }
    SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(gr);
})();]]></script>
